name: A Night to Remember (Asterranaut)
description:
It's your one year anniversary with your girlfriend, who also happens to be the princess of the land. The king refuses to let you see her, but you are determined to fight your way to the top of that castle. It's a difficult path, but you know that no matter what happens tonight, you will spend the rest of it with the love of your life.

☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆

A Night to Remember is an interactive fiction made in Twine 2 for UCSC's ARTG 80H Fall 2018 course. We were required to cite 10 different texts from the readings we did this quarter, hence the quotes and works cited within the game. It also had to be limited to 11 rooms, 250 words each.

There is only one ending, so don't feel pressured to choose one path over the other!

☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆.。.:*・° .。.:*・°☆

** Note: If the music or game isn't loading, try refreshing the page or play it in a different browser! **
